movie.title: CSSA x WICS Movie Night: Turning Red
movie.description: Join us for a movie night! Vote for the movie you want to watch on our Discord server. Click on the title to learn more.

meeting.title: CSSA Winter 2024 General Meeting
meeting.description: Join us for our official Winter 2024 General Meeting where we will vote on changes to our constitution and discuss upcoming plans for the CSSA!

powerpoint.title: CSSA Powerpoint Night
powerpoint.description: Join us for a night of sharing presentations, fun, and community. Apply to present your own powerpoint by clicking on the title.

csseminar.title: Jason Hong: Helping developers with privacy
csseminar.description: Join us for a seminar with Jason Hong, a professor at Carnegie Mellon University, as he discusses his work on privacy and security in software development.
